attributes.action: prohibit the use of the Comic Sans font in any formal documentation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Comic Sans is a font used on computers. It was designed to be used to provide the text of comic strips for which it is emminently suitable. It is not appropriate in any formal setting. It gives official documentation a childlike feel. It should never be a mandatory font in colleges.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
